item.title: How a Free Service Helped This Company Reach $4 Million in Sales
item.description: When Abbode saw the demand for its in-house embroidery climb, founder Abigail Price decided to pull off a pivot.

item.title: AI ‘Consulting’ Services Can Help Smaller Businesses, But Risks Persist
item.description: As with anything related to AI-generated content, it’s important to keep a human in the loop before you act on any of its business advice.

item.title: Inflation Data Could Push Stocks to Record Highs
item.description: The S&P 500 has touched all-time highs following 3 of the last 5 CPI reports.

item.title: Uncle Nearest CEO Fawn Weaver Alleges Smear Campaign Amid Receivership Battle Over $108 Million Default
item.description: Fawn Weaver spoke about her company’s receivership at the Inc. 5000 Conference & Gala in Phoenix, Arizona.

item.title: A Manager Accidentally Leaked Everyone’s Salaries. The Fix Is Simple—But Rarely Done
item.description: When people find out they’re underpaid compared to their colleagues, it’s a source of tension and resentment.
